name: Muhammad Bilal
title: SQA Engineer | Manual, Automation & API Testing
feedback: Wasee immediately impressed me with his expertise in both manual and automation testing. He's a fast learner who rapidly masters new tools and workflows. His sharp analytical skills, attention to detail, and proactive approach make him excellent at identifying and solving issues. Highly adaptable and committed to quality, Wasee delivers outstanding results under pressure and is a valuable addition to any QA team.
